snippet.title: How to Prevent Harmful Infections: Preventing Hospital Infections
snippet.description: Ironically, hospitals are breeding grounds for dangerous infections. Follow these tips for preventing hospital infections, or nosocomial infections... tract infections, surgical wound site infections, bloodstream infections, and pneumonia are the most common illnesses transmitted in hospitals.
